name: Noodlebonks
description:
Wiggle, hop, and attempt to swim as an adorably awkward Noodlebonk!

(Use Spacebar or Enter and arrow keys to interact with the menu)

Noodlebonks are nudibranchs. They can only wiggle as a way of moving. But they also have poisonous stingers on their backs, which pops other Noodlebonks into a cloud of bubbles! Try to tag your opponent with the stingers on your back without getting stung yourself! (1 or 2 players).

I didn't have time to add audio sadly. But if this game is received well, then I'll add some sound effects/music and likely make graphical improvements!

Support me on Twitter: @gg_auroras
